header.title: Journey Timeline
header.subtitle: My professional and academic milestones along the way.

items.title: Lead Mobile Engineer at PT. Ada Ide Langsung Jalan
items.descriptions: Leading a mobile engineering team focused on Smartlink products, managing resources, conducting code reviews, and ensuring smooth cross-module collaboration.

items.title: Mobile Engineer at PT. Ada Ide Langsung Jalan
items.descriptions: Developed core features for the Smartlink cashier app using Flutter, following DDD and Clean Architecture principles.

items.title: Back End Engineer at Stellarlab
items.descriptions: Worked part-time with Node.js and MongoDB. Collaborated closely with mentors to improve scalable backend systems.

items.title: Full Stack Engineer at CV. Gumcode
items.descriptions: Developed several small-scale projects using Flutter and CodeIgniter, focusing on efficient delivery and reusability.

items.title: Android Engineer Intern at PT. Aku Peduli Indonesia
items.descriptions: Developed Android apps using Kotlin and Flutter, including IzzyResto, IzzyInventory, and Rema.
